All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents a financial account belonging to a user in the Finance Tracker System.
AccountController
Provides static methods to manage user accounts in the Finance Tracker System.
AccountMenu
The AccountMenu class provides a console-based menu for managing user accounts in the Finance Tracker System.
Budget
Represents a budget set by a user for a specific category and time period in the Finance Tracker System.
BudgetController
Provides static methods to manage budgets for the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System.
BudgetMenu
The BudgetMenu class provides a console-based menu for managing budgets in the Finance Tracker System.
Category
Represents a category or subcategory for transactions and budgets in the Finance Tracker System.
CategoryController
Provides static methods to manage categories and subcategories for the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System.
CategoryMenu
The CategoryMenu class provides a console-based menu for managing categories and subcategories in the Finance Tracker System.
CategoryType
Enum representing the type of a category in the Finance Tracker System.
Main
Main class for the Budget Management System CLI application.
ProfileMenu
The ProfileMenu class provides a console-based menu for managing the profile of the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System.
Transaction
Represents a financial transaction in the Finance Tracker System.
TransactionController
Provides static methods to manage transactions for the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System.
TransactionMenu
The TransactionMenu class provides a console-based menu for managing transactions in the Finance Tracker System.
User
Represents a user in the Finance Tracker System.
UserController
Provides static methods to manage user profiles, authentication, and persistence in the Finance Tracker System.
UserProfile
Represents the personal profile details of a user in the Finance Tracker System.
UserProfileController
Provides static methods to manage the profile of the currently logged-in user in the Finance Tracker System.
UserType
Enum representing the type of a user in the Finance Tracker System.
